page.description: Get the value of a byte from the blob.
page.original:
.PEEK() Syntax Byte_Value as N = .PEEK( Position as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position of the byte to return.
Description The .PEEK() method returns the value of a byte (8 bit) value at a Position in a blob. The first position is 1. This function returns a -1 if the Position is past the end. Example dim bb as B bb = "Alpha" ? bb.peek(2) = 108.000000
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
